<p><span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\Omega</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.68333em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord">Ω</span></span></span></span></span> : Ensemble des pièces produites par une machine. Pour une pièce <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>ω</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\omega</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.43056em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">ω</span></span></span></span></span> :</p>

&amp;amp; =&amp;amp;E(X^2) - E(X)^2 &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle \sum_{x_i \in X(\Omega)} x_i^2 P(X = x_i) - E(X)^2 \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle 1^2 \times {1 \over 3} + 2^2 \times {1 \over 3} + 3^2 \times {1 \over 3} - 2^2 \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle {14 \over 3} - 4 = {2 \over 3} \\
\\ \\ \hline \\

<h2 id="exercice-6---loi-binomiale">Exercice 6 - Loi binomiale</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>L’expérience montre que 20% des personnes qui réservent une table dans un restaurant ne donnent pas suite.<br>
Un restaurant possède 50 tables. Il accepte 53 réservations. Quelle est la probabilité pour que cela ne se passe pas bien ?</p>

<h2 id="exercice-8---loi-faible-des-grands-nombres">Exercice 8 - Loi faible des grands nombres</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>Avant une élection nationale, on interroge un échantillon de <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.43056em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit">n</span></span></span></span></span> personnes sur leur intention de vote pour un parti donné. <h2 id="exercice-9---intervalle-de-fluctuation">Exercice 9 - Intervalle de fluctuation</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>Une petite ville des États-Unis, Woburn, a connu 9 cas de leucémie parmi les 5 969 garçons de moins de 15 ans sur la période 1969-1979. La fréquence des leucémies pour cette tranche d’âge aux États-Unis est égale à 0,00052.<br>
<em>Source : Massachussets Department of Public Health</em><br>
Les autorités concluent qu’il n’y a rien d’étrange dans cette ville. Qu’en penser ?<br>

E(X) &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle \int_{-\infin}^{+\infin} x f(x) \ dx &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle \int_{- \infin}^0 x \times 0 \ dx + \int_0^{10} x \times {1 \over 10} \ dx +  \int_{10}^{+ \infin}x \times 0 \ dx \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle 0 + {1 \over 10} \int_0^{10} x \ dx + 0 \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle {1 \over 10} \left [ {1 \over 2} x^2 \right ]_0^{10} = {50 \over 10} = 5 \\ \\ \hline \\ 
V(X) &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; E(X^2) - E(X) &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle \int_0^{10} {1 \over 10} x^2 \ dx - 25 \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle {1 \over 10} \int_0^{10} x^2 \ dx - 25 \\ \\
&amp;amp; &amp;amp; &amp;amp;=&amp;amp; \displaystyle {1 \over 10} \left [ {1 \over 3} x^3 \right ]_0^{10} - 25 \\ \\

<h2 id="exercice-12---approximation-dune-loi-binomiale">Exercice 12 - Approximation d’une loi binomiale</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>Une ligne de transmission entre émetteur et récepteur transporte des pages de texte, chaque page étant représentée par 100 000 bits (caractères, informations de transmission et de contrôle). La probabilité qu’un bit soit erroné est estimée à 0,0001 et on admet que les erreurs sont indépendantes les unes des autres.<br>

<h4 id="dans-ces-conditions-déterminer-la-probabilité-quune-page-comporte-au-plus-15-erreurs.">Dans ces conditions, déterminer la probabilité qu’une page comporte au plus 15 erreurs.</h4>
</blockquote>
<p><span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mtable><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>X</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><msup><mn>0</mn><mi>i</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>⩾</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow>&amp;ThickSpace;<mo>⟹</mo>&amp;ThickSpace;</mrow></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>X</mi><mo>⩽</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mn>15</mn></munderover><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></msup><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><msup><mn>0</mn><mi>i</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>≈</mo><mn>95</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{aligned}

</table><h2 id="exercice-13---approximation-dune-loi-binomiale-par-une-loi-normale">Exercice 13 - Approximation d’une loi binomiale par une loi normale</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>[[ Suite de l’exercice 8 ]]</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p>Avant une élection nationale, on interroge un échantillon de <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.43056em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit">n</span></span></span></span></span> personnes sur leur intention de vote pour un parti donné. On note <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>X</mi><mo stretchy="true">‾</mo></mover></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\overline X</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.88333em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord overline"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.88333em;"><span class="" style="top: -3em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.07847em;">X</span></span><span class="" style="top: -3.80333em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="overline-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> la proportion de personnes favorables à ce parti dans l’échantillon.</p>
<h3 id="déterminer-une-valeur-minimale-de-n-permettant-destimer-à-3-près-avec-un-risque-derreur-inférieur-à-5-la-proportion-délecteurs-pi-votant-pour-ce-parti---footnotesize-pleft-lvert-overline-x---pi-right-rvert--003-geqslant-095">Déterminer une valeur minimale de <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.43056em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit">n</span></span></span></span></span> permettant d’estimer à 3% près, avec un risque d’erreur inférieur à 5%, la proportion d’électeurs <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\pi</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.43056em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">π</span></span></span></span></span> votant pour ce parti :  <span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mstyle mathsize="0.8em"><mi>P</mi><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">∣</mo><mover accent="true"><mi>X</mi><mo stretchy="true">‾</mo></mover><mo>−</mo><mi>π</mi><mo fence="true">∣</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>03</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>⩾</mo><mn>0</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>95</mn></mstyle></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\footnotesize P(\left \lvert \overline X - \pi \right \rvert &amp;lt; 0,03) \geqslant 0,95</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1.03266em; vertical-align: -0.29em;"></span><span class="mord mathit sizing reset-size6 size4" style="margin-right: 0.13889em;">P</span><span class="mopen sizing reset-size6 size4">(</span><span class="minner sizing reset-size6 size4"><span class="mopen sizing reset-size4 size6 delimcenter" style="top: 0.05em;">∣</span><span class="mord overline"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.92833em;"><span class="" style="top: -3em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.07847em;">X</span></span><span class="" style="top: -3.83033em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="overline-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.049em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.260222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.260222em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">π</span><span class="mclose sizing reset-size4 size6 delimcenter" style="top: 0.05em;">∣</span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.325278em;"></span><span class="mrel sizing reset-size6 size4">&lt;</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.325278em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.8em; vertical-align: -0.2em;"></span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">0</span><span class="mpunct sizing reset-size6 size4">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.195167em;"></span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">0</span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">3</span><span class="mclose sizing reset-size6 size4">)</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.325278em;"></span><span class="mrel amsrm sizing reset-size6 size4">⩾</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.325278em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.671104em; vertical-align: -0.155552em;"></span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">0</span><span class="mpunct sizing reset-size6 size4">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.195167em;"></span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">9</span><span class="mord sizing reset-size6 size4">5</span></span></span></span></span></span></h3>
<p>Le nombre de personnes favorables au parti considéré <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mover accent="true"><mi>X</mi><mo stretchy="true">‾</mo></mover></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n \overline X</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.88333em; vertical-align: 0em;"></span><span class="mord mathit">n</span><span class="mord overline"><span class="vlist-t"><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height: 0.88333em;"><span class="" style="top: -3em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.07847em;">X</span></span><span class="" style="top: -3.80333em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="overline-line" style="border-bottom-width: 0.04em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> suit la loi binomiale <span class="katex--inline"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mi mathvariant="script">B</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\mathcal B (n, \pi)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 1em; vertical-align: -0.25em;"></span><span class="mord mathcal" style="margin-right: 0.03041em;">B</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathit">n</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right: 0.166667em;"></span><span class="mord mathit" style="margin-right: 0.03588em;">π</span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span> qu’on souhaite approcher par une loi normale.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<h4 id="préciser-les-paramètres-de-la-loi-normale-envisagée-et-rappeler-les-conditions-dapproximation.">Préciser les paramètres de la loi normale envisagée et rappeler les conditions d’approximation.</h4>
</blockquote>
<p><span class="katex--display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math><semantics><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>X</mi><mo stretchy="true">‾</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>X</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>X</mi><mi>N</mi></msub></mrow><mi>n</mi></mfrac>&amp;ThickSpace;<mo>⟹</mo>&amp;ThickSpace;<mi>n</mi><mover accent="true"><mi>X</mi><mo stretchy="true">‾</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>X</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>X</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>∼</mo><mi mathvariant="script">B</mi><mo>(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\overline X =
 {{X_1 + \dots + X_N} \over n} \implies n \overline X = X_1 + \dots + X_n \sim \mathcal B(n, \pi)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height: 0.88333em;
